children.text: This door is binding when in use, making it difficult to operate.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 8.07 Operation of windows and doors states that

‘The installation of doors and windows is defective if, within three months of completion, they bind or jam as a result of the builder’s workmanship, or do not operate as intended by the manufacturer’.
This door should be adjusted so it operates properly without binding.
